author: nero_eth
content:
As a heads-up, I've merged [this](https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/11264) PR for EIP-7976 (calldata cost increase cfi'd for glamsterdam):
Today's calldata pricing is 4/16 and 10/40 at the floor.
The original proposal increased it to 4/16 and 15/60 at the floor.
After discussions, it's not increased to 4/16 and 64/64 at the floot.

This means, at the floor, we don't differentiate between zero and nonzero bytes. This caps both, the compressed and uncompressed block size efficiently. Check out the PR for more context.
